ru: Вытяните ноги и разведите руки в стороны.
Большие пальцы поместите во внутрь кулаков.
en: Put the thumbs into the fists.
Press back with the back of your head.
enSynonyms: Use the back of your head to press backwards.
Push back using the back of your neck.
Press your head back, using the back of your neck.
Press backward with the back of your skull.
Drive your head backward with the back of your neck.
Push the back of your head backwards.
Engage the back of your neck to press back.
Use the back of your neck to push back.
Push the back of your head towards the floor.
Press backward through the back of your head.
Push your head back with the back of your neck.
Use your neck to press back gently.
Drive your neck back, pressing with the back of your head.
